channel.title: So when is mesa hitting steam?
channel.description: As I can remember we(the bm community) rushed to get this game greenlit. I think it was the first to get greenlit. Anyways, when is it actualy hitting steam? Ace of Spades, Forge,Waking Mars have already hit steam and were greenlit far after BM. :freeman::|:3 :smiley:

item.title: So when is mesa hitting steam?
item.dc:creator: Keresh
item.description:
So when is mesa hitting steam?

When you can download it from steam.

item.title: So when is mesa hitting steam?
item.dc:creator: Artic_Xiongmao
item.description:
I hope it’s soon, if it’s just about bug fixes and not Xen…

I hope they make some developer commentaries eventually, too. For me, personally, it’s even more important than getting the ending done. But that’s just my thing. However, I think most people would find the dev’s comments incredibly insightful.

Read full topic
item.source: So when is mesa hitting steam?

item.title: So when is mesa hitting steam?
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
And apparently crashing is such a huge and widespread problem, I doubt the team (nor Valve/Steam) would want to release with that of all problems.

Read full topic
item.source: So when is mesa hitting steam?

item.title: So when is mesa hitting steam?
item.dc:creator: Nik1895
item.description:
TehBoxNoob:

How can you apply that “when its done”, while the first part of the mod is already released?

Because putting a game on Steam with all Steamworks features and such isn’t as simple as you think. Besides, like it’s been said earlier, they want to release updated version on Steam so they are currently fixing bugs.

Read full topic
